typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderID as integer,
		OrderDate as timestamp,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone as string,
		SMSOptin as boolean,
		SMSStatus as string,
		Email as string,
		ReceiptUrl as string,
		Total as decimal(18,2),
		PaymentTransactionId as string,
		HasBeenShipped as boolean,
		OrderDetailId as integer,
		ProductId as integer,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitPrice as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select [Orders].orderID , \nOrderDate, \nFirstName, \nLastName, \nAddress,\nCity, \nState, \nPostalCode, \nCountry, \nPhone, \nSMSOptin, \nSMSStatus, \nOrders.Email, \nReceiptUrl,\nTotal, \nPaymentTransactionId,\nHasBeenShipped,\nOrderDetailId,\nProductId,\nQuantity,\nUnitPrice\n from [dbo].[Orders] \ninner join [dbo].[OrderDetails]\non [dbo].[OrderDetails].orderid = [dbo].[Orders].orderid',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		orderID as integer,
		OrderDate as string,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		PostalCode as string,
		Country as string,
		Phone as string,
		SMSOptin as boolean,
		SMSStatus as string,
		Email as string,
		ReceiptUrl as string,
		Total as double,
		PaymentTransactionId as string,
		HasBeenShipped as boolean,
		OrderDetails as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/orderid'],
	throughput: 4000,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
